pkgmetadata.longdescription: Additional 'TSdbi' Extensions to Wrap Miscellaneous Data Sources // Methods to retrieve data from different sources. This includes a 'TSdbi' interface for R package 'Quandl' and access to data (at www.quandl.com). Comprehensive examples of all the 'TS*' packages is provided in the vignette Guide.pdf with the 'TSdata' package.
